verse:
निम्नगानां यथा गङ्गा देवानामच्युतो यथा ।
वैष्णवानां यथा शम्भुः पुराणानामिदं तथा ॥

terms.nimna-gānām: of rivers flowing down to the sea
terms.acyutaḥ: the infallible Supreme Personality of Godhead

vedabase.translation: Just as the Gaṅgā is the greatest of all rivers, Lord Acyuta the supreme among deities and Lord Śambhu [Śiva] the greatest of Vaiṣṇavas, so Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam is the greatest of all Purāṇas.

terms.अच्युतः: Achyuta (a name of Lord Vishnu, meaning "imperishable")
terms.वैष्णवानाम्: among the Vaishnavas (followers of Lord Vishnu)
terms.शम्भुः: Shambhu (a name of Lord Shiva, meaning "auspicious one")
